Was looking forward to checking out @ITB_Berlin next week. Officially canceled now due to #Coronavirus #Covid19. Probably the right call with 160k people expected from 180+ countries, but communication was abysmal and unnecessarily last-minute. #itbberlin #itbberlin2020 #ITB
